title: WellCat Health Center
cleaned_text: WellCat Health Center Tips for a Successful Visit Arrive Early - You must arrive 15 minutes prior to an appointment. Arriving late will result in cancellation. Bring Your ID - make sure you have a legible student ID with you. Avoid $25 No-Show Fee - if you can't make it, please call to cancel to avoid the no-show fee. Patient Portal Did you know? Students can [request a prescription refill or send a secure message to a provider](https://shs-iis.csuchico.edu/) through your patient portal.
